name: Curved Walnut Bar Stool - Boucle
description: Complete your kitchen space with our new Curved Walnut Bar Stool. To be part of a set or to stand alone, the Curved Walnut Bar Stool represents both luxury and comfort. The plush curves offer a reimagined modern take on 1970's design. Rich warm walnut is paired with textural off-white boucle creating a show stopping elegant stool. The seamlessly curved wooden frame is made from solid ash which has been stained a rich walnut. For a harmonious dining setting pair with our Curved Walnut Dining Chair.
